description.value:
Instead of chain links, this +1 chain shirt is assembled from metal "leaves" that each resemble a small blade.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You pull a link from the armor, which transforms into a +1 striking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Dagger]. The dagger disappears and reappears as a link in the armor after you Strike with it, or at the end of this turn if you don't make a Strike. You can Activate the blade byrnie in place of an Interact action to draw a weapon for abilities such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Quick Draw] feat.

Upgrading the runes on the blade byrnie makes the daggers pulled from it more powerful. The daggers have a +2 weapon potency rune if the armor has a +2 armor potency rune, or a +3 weapon potency rune if the armor has a +3 armor potency rune.
